page.title: 11The school
page.content: An Interview with Mrs. Chapman, the headteacher. Mrs Chapman lives in Shouldham, a village about eight miles away from East Winch. She is married to a farmer. The two other teachers live in Fair Green and North Runcton which are both a few miles away from the school. They all travel to school by car. Most of the other people who work in the school live in the village. The main changes to take place in the school have been the incresing use of educational television and the introduction of computers. The children now work far more at their own pace rather than working together as a class.
